bibl.title: Power of Attorney, John Stille in Philadelphia, Pa., 1800 Feb. 12
bibl.note: Insurance Company of North America Records, 1792 December 1-1843 February 18

projectDesc.p: Machine-readable transcription created for the University of Tennessee Libraries Special Collections.

editorialDecl.p: Errors in transcription of the printed text not controlled.
Editorial tags limited to gap and unclear.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

revisionDesc.change: Approximate date of original transcription and transcriber.
Migrating from P4 to validated TEI P5.

div.p: Know all men by these presents that I JohnStille of the City of Philadelphia State of Pennsylvania do make ordain and constitute and in my place and stead put &depute John Stille Jr of the said City of Philadelphia my true and lawful Attorney, for me and in my name to sell assign and transfer Eleven shares of the stock of the Insurance Co of North America standing in my name on the Books of the said Company
In witness whereof I have hereunto set my hand and seal this twelfth day of February in the year of our Lord One thousand Eight hundred.
